ChapterShortDescription: Event-Surabaya is an initiative to focus efforts to disseminate information about events held by communities, especially in Surabaya
ChapterLongDec: Event-Surabaya is an information service to display all events held by the developer community, especially in Surabaya. We try to involve student developers, new graduates, and professionals through our hacking & meeting events. Technology awareness is our main goal, the motive is to create a local ecosystem for programmers & hackers  around Surabaya. We hereby hope that the development of technology will be better known by developers in Surabaya.
